data.name: Portfolio Website
data.description: My portfolio website, built with React, showcases my skills and projects as a developer. With a clean and modern design, it offers a seamless user experience, allowing visitors to easily explore my full-stack projects, mobile apps, and other software endeavors. The website reflects my commitment to impactful and visually appealing web development.

data.name: Mobihealth Receptionist
data.description: Revamped receptionist application with a new design, modern APIs, and additional features for faster performance and better user experience. Added dynamic pages, stats, and graphs for enhanced data visualization. The result is an optimized and cutting-edge tool for streamlined reception management.

data.name: Child Vaccine Parenting lulaby
data.description: Completely revamped the Child Vaccine Parenting Lulaby application, enhancing its functionality with a new lullaby feature. Implemented important features such as play in the background, repeat, and auto turn-off after a few minutes, providing an optimized and user-friendly experience. The addition of these features elevated the application, making it a valuable tool for parents in managing their child's vaccine schedule while offering soothing lullabies for a calming experience.

data.name: Mobihealth Doctor
data.description: Successfully integrated Agora SDK for telemedicine, enabling seamless video consultations. Additionally, I implemented a digital prescription module, allowing doctors to provide prescriptions directly from their phones. The app's design was revamped to optimize performance and provide a better, modern user experience. Notably, I introduced patient relation management features and other enhancements, resulting in a comprehensive and efficient tool for healthcare professionals to manage patient interactions and deliver quality care.

data.name: Chronico - Mobihealth
data.description: In Chronico patient application, I played a pivotal role in implementing a personalized health news feed, enabling daily delivery of relevant articles to users. Additionally, I integrated the Agora Video SDK for seamless telemedicine services and developed a doctor appointment booking module for convenient scheduling. Notably, I designed a dynamic home screen displaying important updates and sections, and incorporated the Google Maps SDK to help patients locate nearby doctors, significantly improving the overall user experience.

data.name: React Todo App
data.description: Created a Todo app using React, Express, Node.js, and MongoDB, offering a seamless user experience for managing tasks day-wise. The app allows users to add, delete, and update their todos, with an option to view all tasks at a glance. Each todo is set to a default pending state, but users can easily check them off to mark them as completed. This application provides a practical and efficient solution for organizing daily tasks and tracking progress.
